From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Apeface lands, transforming into his robot mode, and walks deep into the
smoke of the bar. He could scarcelly make out three figures, two of them
trying to rip each other apart. He held out his gun, and blasted his
sonic gun in the middle to split them up. "Break it up." He grunted,
pointing his gun at the robot he didnt know. The robot recognized him,
and stood up saluting. "Pardon sir, unit Nightmare, requesting
forgivness. I didnt know he was a friend of a Decepticon." Apeface
grunted, he didnt perticualarily like Quake, but he could be helpful.
Nightmare however would be great help. "We will let you off Nightmare,
if you join us." 

Nightmare didnt move, he looked at Jagged. "Only if he can come." as
said, motioning to the broken form. "Whatever, hurry." Apeface said,
running out, and transforming into his jet mode, taking off. Quake
followed, taking off the ground, grunting at the two punks. Nightmare
walked out solenmly. "Well brother, looks like youll get your chance to
serve the Decepticon empire." he said, transforming into a hover
vehicle. Jagged got on, and they too took off.
